verses.text: \w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ones \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w document|strong="H2856"\w*: Nehemiah the governor, son of Hacaliah, and also Zedekiah,
Maaziah, Bilgai,\f + \fr 10:8 \ft Bilgai is a variant of Bilgah; see Nehemiah 12:5.\f* and Shemaiah. These were the priests.
\w The|strong="H3548"\w* Levites: Jeshua son of Azaniah, Binnui of the sons of Henadad, Kadmiel,
and their associates: Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
And \w the|strong="H1137"\w* leaders of \w the|strong="H1137"\w* people: Parosh, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Malluch, Harim, and Baanah. The Vows of the Covenant

“\w The|strong="H1196"\w* rest of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people—\w the|strong="H1196"\w* priests, Levites, gatekeepers, singers, temple servants,\f + \fr 10:28 \ft Hebrew Nethinim\f* \w and|strong="H2766"\w* all who had separated themselves from \w the|strong="H1196"\w* people of \w the|strong="H1196"\w* land to obey \w the|strong="H1196"\w* Law of God—along with their wives \w and|strong="H2766"\w* all their sons \w and|strong="H2766"\w* daughters who are able to understand,

hereby join \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* noble \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* commit \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sworn oath \w to|strong="H1121"\w* follow \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God given \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* servant Moses \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w carefully|strong="H3605"\w* \w obey|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commandments, ordinances, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* statutes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w We|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* daughters \w in|strong="H5921"\w* marriage \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* people \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* daughters \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* merchandise \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* kind \w of|strong="H1121"\w* grain \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w sell|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Sabbath day, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w buy|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* Sabbath \w or|strong="H3808"\w* holy day. \w Every|strong="H3947"\w* seventh \w year|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fields \w lie|strong="H5414"\w* fallow, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* cancel \w every|strong="H3947"\w* debt.

\w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3027"\w* \w place|strong="H3027"\w* ourselves \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* obligation \w to|strong="H3027"\w* contribute \w a|strong="H3068"\w* third \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shekel \f + \fr 10:32 \ft A third of a shekel is approximately 0.13 ounces or 3.8 grams, probably of silver.\f* \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* showbread, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w regular|strong="H5656"\w* grain offerings \w and|strong="H1004"\w* burnt offerings, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Sabbath offerings, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* New Moons \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* feasts, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* holy offerings, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin offerings \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* atonement \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* duties \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* cast lots \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests, Levites, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* people \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* donation \w of|strong="H1004"\w* wood \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w times|strong="H4150"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* year. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* bring \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God \w to|strong="H3478"\w* burn \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Law.

We \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3881"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H1486"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6086"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sons \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* livestock, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* written \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Law, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstborn \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* herds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* flocks \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priests \w who|strong="H3605"\w* minister \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Moreover, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* bring \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* storerooms \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God \w the|strong="H3548"\w* firstfruits \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our dough, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our grain offerings, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H1121"\w* all our trees, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our new wine \w and|strong="H1121"\w* oil. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* tenth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our produce belongs \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w Levites|strong="H1121"\w*, so \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H3789"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* receive tithes \w in|strong="H1004"\w* all \w the|strong="H3548"\w* towns \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* labor.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aaron’s line \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* accompany \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w when|strong="H5656"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* collect \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w bring|strong="H3881"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* storerooms \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasury|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* Israelites \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* contributions \w of|strong="H1121"\w* grain, new wine, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* oil \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* storerooms \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* articles \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* ministering \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H5927"\w* gatekeepers, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* singers stay. \w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* neglect \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* God.”
